item.description: EXPERIENCE Engineering Team Employer: FamPay.in | Apr, 20 - Current | Bengaluru TODO Senior Software Engineer Employer: Truebil.com | Nov, 19 - Apr, 20 | Mumbai Optimized and developed new APIs of Truebil‚Äôs Progressive Web App which is now part of Google Case Study. Achieved Avg response time of 51ms from 180ms. Resulting 80% increase in revenue-to-marketing spend. (Django-REST-Framework, Mysql 5.7, Redis)Ref: How Truebil made the web its channel of growth Architect redis caching layer of backend api, which resulted in +435% throughput capacity and 66% reduction of EC2 instance consumption.

item.title: üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Privacy Policy
item.description: TLDR: We do not use cookies and we do not collect any personal data. Website visitors No personal information is collected. No information is stored in the browser. No information is shared with, sent to or sold to third-parties. No information is shared with advertising companies. No information is mined and harvested for personal and behavioral trends. No information is monetized. Information we collect and what we use it for The following information is collected:
